thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's IDBI Bank Dec Qtr Loss Narrows

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's IDBI Bank Dec Qtr Loss Narrows
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - IDBI Bank Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 15.24 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS LOSS OF 22.55 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 57.97 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 65.16 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS AND CONTINGENCIES 41.79 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 32.06 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 36.50 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 31.36 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 24.72 PERCENT VERSUS 24.98 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 16.02 PERCENT VERSUS 16.06 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2DYWamZ Further company coverage:
